ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Level to attain
ygData.msgSnippet: It all depends on the class. For instance, my cleric has to be much higher than the level to attain generally. Unless he is in a group with higher levels and
ygData.messageBody:
It all depends on the class. For instance, my cleric has to be much higher
than the level to attain generally. Unless he is in a group with higher
levels and then he can do it below or at the level. Clerics are not good at
soloing-- at least mine isn't. But my brother's paladin could probably do
things while below the level to attain. So I think it's averaged. I sort of
think they have the level set at the level of whatever mob is involved.
luv,
-Su

> For those who use Alahkhazam, what is your take on the "Level to
> attain" recommendation? Is it a recommendation for a group quest, or
> solo? If it is a group recommendation, how much do you think it
> should be bumped up for a solo quest?
>
> Barto Proudfoot
> lvl 31 Halfling Druid
> Zeb server
>
>
